Name: Mewsifer Console
Author: WittleWolfie and Bubbles

Latest.Changelog:
- Fixed stack trace logging for UMM Logger exceptions
- Added a menu option to generate a Mod Bug Report (aka log dump) using [ModMenu](https://github.com/WittleWolfie/ModMenu)

Description: An improved remote console for reading logs in Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous. Supports generating mod bug reports in conjunction with Mewsifer Console Menu.
